content: Let's advance equality for LGBTI globally & end discrimination. @UNHumanRights Chief @mbachelet calls on businesses to adopt UN #BizHumanRights Standards, which help companies protect & stand up for LGBTI rights. Watch #LGBTIbroadcast: https://t.co/5ttVsODqCd #WEF19 @Sandervtn https://t.co/JXvwdSj5Iz
